Posted By: powerdude (11/21/2009 4:18:35 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Not as bad as it used to be. WW's [Amulet of Vigor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Amulet of Vigor) would give you the ability to untap and retap for Convoke mana, if that is worth anything. But to be honest, a 3/5 USED to be worth something, even for 5 mana. Sure it wasn't an amazing card, but it was draftable. Obviously not a constructed playable, but I recently lost a draft match to a[Battle Hurda](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Battle Hurda). It all depends on how you're playing.
posts.html:

Posted By: Huffytreefolkman (6/19/2011 4:29:04 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
**Each *Time Spiral* card was an homage to at least one previously printed card.**  
  
This card references the very first treefolk, [Ironroot Treefolk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ironroot Treefolk). It's "enters play tapped" line of text is playing with the set's theme of time, speeding up or slowing down.
posts.html:
Each Time Spiral card was an homage to at least one previously printed card.

This card references the very first treefolk, Ironroot Treefolk. It's "enters play tapped" line of text is playing with the set's theme of time, speeding up or slowing down.
